result.title: Data Management Plan (DMP)
result.description: This deliverable will contain the Data Management Plan (DMP), which will be updated in M14 and M26. This DMP will include procedures to ensure that data are handled according to the FAIR principles (findable, accessible, interoperable, and re-usable). It will deal with the handling of research data during and after the end of the project, the types of primary and secondary data that will be collected and processed, the data collection methodology, how the data will be made openly accessible, and how data will be stored and preserved after the project’s end.

result.title: Data Management Plan (DMP) - Update 1
result.description: This deliverable (updated version of the one delivered at M3) will contain the Data Management Plan (DMP). This DMP will include procedures to ensure that data are handled according to the FAIR principles (findable, accessible, interoperable, and re-usable). It will deal with the handling of research data during and after the end of the project, the types of primary and secondary data that will be collected and processed, the data collection methodology, how the data will be made openly accessible, and how data will be stored and preserved after the project’s end.

result.title: Initial Common SSI Framework
result.description: Literature overview of state-of-the-art of SSI components in the world, as well as status of relevant standards and ongoing standardisation work. Availability of those components for the eSSIF-Lab via project endorsers (see Section 2.2.3). Initial architecture design and interface identification. This deliverable is input to third-party subgrantees for Phase 1. (Leader: TNO; M08; R; PU).
